mapper.select: select subj_name,classroom,lec_date_1,lec_date_2, lm.subj_cd, syl_cd as lec_cd, comm_cd_func('lecCategoryCd',lec_category_cd) as lec_category_cd,credit,(select name from prof where prof_cd=prof_id) as name, final_score,final_marks from lec_manage lm, syllabus sy,lec lc where lm.subj_cd=sy.subj_cd and lc.lec_cd=sy.syl_cd and lc.stu_cd=#{stuCd} and sy.syl_cd in (select lec_cd from lec where stu_cd=#{stuCd} and grade_seme_cd=#{gradeSemeCd}) order by syl_cd

select (select subj_name from lec_manage lm, syllabus sy where lm.subj_cd=sy.subj_cd and sy.syl_cd=std.syl_cd)as subj_name, syl_cd as lec_cd,mid_ratio,final_ratio,assign_ratio,attend_ratio from marks_std std where syl_cd = #{lecCd}

select a.lec_cd,sum(score*eval_rate*0.01) as score from ass_submit a,assignment b where a.ass_bno=b.ass_bno and a.lec_cd in (select lec_cd from lec where stu_cd=#{stuCd} and grade_seme_cd=#{gradeSemeCd}) and stu_cd=#{stuCd} group by a.lec_cd order by lec_cd

select lec_cd,attend_status_cd,count(*) as attend_count from attend where lec_cd in (select lec_cd from lec where stu_cd=#{stuCd} and grade_seme_cd=#{gradeSemeCd}) group by lec_cd,attend_status_cd order by lec_cd

select lec_cd,score from exam_apply where exam_seq in (select exam_seq from exam where exam_div_cd='mid' and lec_cd in (select lec_cd from lec where stu_cd=#{stuCd} and grade_seme_cd=#{gradeSemeCd})) order by lec_cd

select lec_cd,score from exam_apply where exam_seq in (select exam_seq from exam where exam_div_cd='fin' and lec_cd in (select lec_cd from lec where stu_cd=#{stuCd} and grade_seme_cd=#{gradeSemeCd})) order by lec_cd

select ab.ass_bno,(select subj_name from lec_manage where subj_cd=(select subj_cd from syllabus where syl_cd=ab.lec_cd)) as subj_name,ab.lec_cd,ab.title,ab.create_date,ab.due_date,ab.eval_rate,ab.content,bc.submit_date,bc.score as score,nvl(comm_cd_func('subEvalStatusCd',sub_eval_status_cd),'미제출')as sub_eval_status_cd from (select * from assignment a where a.lec_cd=#{lecCd}) ab, (select a.ass_bno,a.lec_cd,a.title,create_date,due_date,eval_rate,content,submit_date,score, sub_eval_status_cd from assignment a, ass_submit b where a.ass_bno=b.ass_bno and a.lec_cd=#{lecCd} and stu_cd =#{stuCd} order by create_date desc) bc where ab.ass_bno=bc.ass_bno(+) and ab.lec_cd=bc.lec_cd(+) order by ab.create_date desc
